short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mobile browser emulator mainly for testing the responsiveness of web pages on various mobile screen sizes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mobrem enhances developer experience by emulating mobile browsers, enabling mostly developers to efficiently test their web pages on various screen sizes, including the portrait and landscape orientations without having to regularly toggle the DevTools.
